name: Leaf Catcher
description:
Leaf Catcher is a free game where you suck up leaves in a zen and colorful environment.

Collect as many leaves as you can sell and thus infinitely improve your leaf vacuum to collect even more leaves.

- Hypercasual 3D game.

- Colorful cartoon universe.

- Three types of levels of evolutions of the leaf vacuum cleaner.

- Several different leaf colors.

- Calm and relaxing game.

- Earn as many coins as possible.

- Simple and intuitive control.

- And still more leaves!

Have fun in Leaf Catcher
